quest.name: Doing Her Part
journal: Serpent Sergeant Lucinne seems to have a lot on her plate.

dialogue.name: LUCINNE
dialogue.text: Serpent Sergeant Lucinne, at your service... Or I would be, if I were not so terribly busy. I've been tasked with assessing the environmental impact of the Garleans' occupation of Gyr Abania.

dialogue.name: LUCINNE
dialogue.text: There is so much to do, yet my superiors never thought to assign anyone to assist me. Can you believe it?

dialogue.name: LUCINNE
dialogue.text: <sigh> I fear I will never finish at my present pace. Unless... Do you suppose you have time to gather a few samples for me?

dialogue.name: LUCINNE
dialogue.text: Three from the soil amidst the magitek wreckage in East End, and one from the Velodyna River. No need to rush, there is plenty here to keep me occupied until you return.

dialogue.name: LUCINNE
dialogue.text: I realize what a burden I've placed on you, but it is imperative we learn what effects the Garleans have had on the environment here.

dialogue.name: LUCINNE
dialogue.text: Ah, you've returned. Did you bring the samples?

dialogue.name: LUCINNE
dialogue.text: Splendid! Absolutely splendid! Thank you ever so much.

dialogue.name: LUCINNE
dialogue.text: Everyone seems so preoccupied with battle, there likely wouldn't be a surveying of the land had I not volunteered.

dialogue.name: LUCINNE
dialogue.text: I do not question the importance of this fight with the Garleans, but we have a duty to maintain the natural balance of the forest.

dialogue.name: LUCINNE
dialogue.text: Thanks to your efforts, I am one step closer to determining how much work it will require to do so.
